Al-Jazeera is crucial because so many households in the Middle East turn to it in times of turmoil, said Dana Shell Smith, deputy assistant secretary for international media engagement, an office created last summer. If we are not in the conversation, people will be speaking for us or about us, said Shell Smith, who speaks Arabic. "We need to make sure we are out there speaking for ourselves." that's a government takeover of health care and the American people know it," Mike Pence said. Democrats countered that the law is already benefiting millions of Americans and should not be derailed. All the archaeological sites in Aswan, such as the Temple of Philae, the Unfinished Obelisk, the Island of Kalabsha, the Tombs of the Nomarchs, and Elephantine Island are completely safe," Zahi Hawass says. The temples of Edfu and Kom Ombo are also safe. All of the tombs in the Valley of the Kings, Valley of the Queens, Tombs of the Nobles, and the temples of Luxor and Karnak are safe.
